name: Legend of Two Wolves
description:
2019 Spring UE4 Game Jam theme is "The other side of the coin" 
Legend of Two Wolves is about a native american man's journey to find his own peace with himself.  His tribe shaman sent him to spiritual island of Nigadu to find spirit wolves and learn how to deal with his inner wolves.

How to play:

W,A,S,D for walking

Press Shift for running

You can jump with Space Bar while running

Press E key for interaction

Team Information:

Team Name: Mythra Tech

www.twitter.com/mythratech
